name: Hasim Amal
title: Computer Engineer
reviews: A computer engineer is a highly skilled professional who specializes in designing, developing, and maintaining computer systems and their components.

name: Khademul Akbar
title: Electrical Engineer
reviews: Electrical engineers are essential professionals who work with electrical systems, devices, and technology to design, develop, and maintain.

name: Reshmi Hasila
title: Chef Instructors
reviews: A chef instructor, also known as a culinary instructor or culinary educator, is a professional chef with a passion for teaching and sharing their culinary expertise.

name: Dr Yunush khan
title: Food Consultation
reviews: Food consultation, often referred to as culinary consulting or food service consulting, is a specialized service provided by professionals with expertise in the culinary industry.

name: Premmoy Mukharjee
title: Professor Teacher
reviews: A professor, often referred to as a university professor or simply a teacher in the context of higher education, is an esteemed and highly educated.
